name: Mass-emailed a link with a typo
description: If you would have sent a Novu.Link, you could update the destination URL even after its been sent.

name: Printed 100,000 flyers with the old (wrong) website
description: Easy hack to double your costs and create awkward discussions with stakeholders. Or don’t, just by printing a QR code generated from Novu.Link - you can change those even after they’ve been printed.

name: Forgot to re-buy your domain
description: Welp ok, lets be honest - thats a huge oversight. Luckily people with your Novu.Link can be temporarily redirected to your Facebook page while you, uhhh, “fix some minor unforeseen technical issues”.

name: Link too long to send in WhatsApp
description: Yep, WhatsApp has limitations on link lengths, especially when they are actions in button. Since you’re using Novu.Link magic links, you don’t have that problem.
